name: Android Phone
description:
Client is a 56 years old man who lives alone with his wife.His employment has been unstable, primarily due to his history of incarceration. In mid-2024, client developed gastroenterological issues requiring frequent restroom breaks, further affecting his employability.His wife works as a cleaner, earning approximately $1,600 per month. Since December 2024, the family has exhausted their savings and sought financial assistance from social service agencies.
His current phone is unable to download SingPass due to the outdated OS. Thus, we hope to source for a new phone for him.

name: Grocereies (Dry & Wet)
description: Low income family with 2 young children is requesting for groceries (both dry & wet). Client is the sole breadwinner for the house and his wife who has multiple physical and mental health concerns is the primary caregiver for the children. For further details, please contact their social worker, Ms. Seelvi, at 8699 3152. Thank you.

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Tanjong Pagar
contact.name: Lynette Tan

name: Halal Food Rations & Household Items
description: Client and her boyfriend are currently taking care of a 3-year old girl whose mother is incarcerated. The young couple is seeking employment at the moment and are staying in a rental house. They are trying to cope financially and would appreciate having rations or some rations to tide over this difficult time. Do contact Marilyn via Whatsapp at 81214654 to discuss the list of items that will benefit this family, thank you!

name: Ensure Life Strength Pro
description: Family has a youth with special needs who requires assistance in his ADLs. The youth also has some health concerns with multiple medical follow ups. The youth is severely underweight and is recommended by the Dietician to consume 3 cups of Ensure Life a day. Taking account the required intake, the family would need to purchase 7 tins of milk powder monthly which is a significant expense. Father is the main breadwinner while mother is full time caregiver to the youth. Despite tight finances, the family is committed to care for the youth.

name: Milk Formula
description:
Single mother who was previously incarcerated is the main caregiver of her 5-year old son. Her elderly parents have been the boy's caregivers but they have been struggling financially and emotionally with housing and recent medical bills (grandma has undergone amputation of toes due to infection caused by diabetes and has been hospitalized for almost a month). As the single mother is still emplaced at a halfway house, she is trying her best to take care of the family during this difficult time. 

As a bulk of the caregiving expenses is for milk formula, she would appreciate support in purchasing it. Her son drinks Nestle Nan Optipro Growing Up Milk Formula - Stage 4, which can be found at NTUC.

The link to the milk formula: https://www.fairprice.com.sg/product/nestle-nan-optipro-kid-children-milk-formula-stage-4-850g-13193246?srsltid=AfmBOoqaub7WwFRi3o2XxV7uLiUbjmgiggP18PA0eNrFeye5Q1ym7xDy 

Do reach out to Marilyn at 81214654 if there are further clarifications needed. Thank you for supporting the family!

name: Tablets

name: Nestle BOOST Isocal Liquid
description: Elderly couple living in a rental flat.  Male client is unemployed due to medical reasons as he is following up with treatments for cancer and heart condition.  Female client also has heart condition, high cholesterol and  arthritis.  Female client has a daughter from her previous marriage who is divorced and working to support her own family of 3 school-going children.  Female elderly client is working as a full-time cleaner in a hospital.  Male client has lost a lot of appetite and weight due to his chemotherapy treatments and is recommended by doctor to consume Nestle Boost Isocal Liquid for nutritional supplement.  Client finds it difficult to afford the high cost of $65 per carton despite her hospital staff discount and her husband is unable to tolerate other types of milk. Client's mum needs Tena Pants Size XL.

name: Abbott Similac AR thickening infant formula.

Abbott Similac AR thickening infant formula. 

Client is a young parent of a 4-month-old son and 2-year-old son with limited social support following her husband's recent incarceration. Client is in dire need of milk formula and diapers for her young children in the midst of exploring alternatives in concretising financial support for the household in the absence of her husband.

name: Request for Smart TV Donation for a Wheelchair-Bound Client
description:
Dear Community,

Seeking a Smart TV donation for a wheelchair-bound client whose current TV is no longer functional. As she is unable to work due to her disability, a replacement TV would provide her with much-needed comfort and help her stay connected to the world around her.

A second-hand Smart TV in good working condition would be deeply appreciated. Please ensure the item is functional, safe to use, and free from defects.

Your generosity will bring a significant source of joy and comfort to her daily life. Thank you for your kindness and support.

Best regards,
Hafiz

name: Television set (small)

Elderly aged 71 years old, divorcee. She shares estranged relationship with her children, lost contact for more than 15 years. She is unable to recall details easily and does not have sufficient support from her family. She is currently living alone with minimal assistance from her co-tenants. She enjoys watching TV as part of her daily routine and it is crucial for her engagement and comfort. Her television has recently stopped working, and she is unable to afford a replacement on her own.

She has multiple chronic medical conditions. She has mild cognitive impairment and mostly home bound.  

A small to medium sized television in good working condition, would be greatly appreciated.

Please contact me via WhatsApp at 98639806 to arrange the donation. Thank you

It is also tough for the family to handwash all their clothes due to the large number of family members they have. As such, we are hoping a kind donor would be able to donate a good working preloved washing machine or a new one for them. Please feel free to email me for more information. Happy holidays!
